name: FHIR
description: FHIR is a Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources (hl7.org/fhir) It is a next generation standards framework created by HL7. FHIR combines the best features of HL7's v2, HL7 v3 and CDA product lines while leveraging the latest web standards and applying a tight focus on implementability. This connector enables FHIR integration with WSO2 EI.
